eu.amidst.huginlink.inference

Class HuginInference

  • java.lang.Object
    • eu.amidst.huginlink.inference.HuginInference
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    InferenceAlgorithm

    public class HuginInference
extends java.lang.Object
implements InferenceAlgorithm
    This class provides an interface to perform Bayesian network inference using the Hugin inference engine.
